item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Usain Bolt's 9.58 at world championships shatters 100-meter record
item.description: Usain Bolt has captured another world record, winning the 100-meter race in 9.58 seconds at the world championships.

item.dc:creator: ESPN.com news services
item.title: New York Mets third baseman David Wright out of hospital with post-concussion symptoms after beaning
item.description: Mets third baseman David Wright was discharged Sunday from a hospital in New York a day after suffering a concussion when he was struck in the head by a pitch from San Francisco Giants starter Matt Cain.

item.dc:creator: External
item.title: Cup race at Michigan under way (ESPN)

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Mark Sanchez to start at QB for Jets in next game
item.description: Rookie quarterback Mark Sanchez, coming off an impressive NFL debut, will start the New York Jets' preseason game at Baltimore next week.

item.dc:creator: ESPN.com news services
item.title: Los Angeles Dodgers pitcher Hiroki Kuroda released from hospital
item.description: Los Angeles pitcher Hiroki Kuroda was discharged from a Phoenix hospital and the right-hander is expected to rejoin the team Sunday, the Dodgers said in a statement.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Mark Messier rejoins New York Rangers as assistant to GM
item.description: Mark Messier is back with the Rangers.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Knee swelling benches New York Yankees' Hideki Matsui indefinitely
item.description: Hideki Matsui has been held out of the New York Yankees lineup because of swelling in his balky knee and is out indefinitely.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Nationals president Stan Kasten: 'Very real possibility' No. 1 draft pick Stephen Strasburg won't sign record deal
item.description: Nationals president Stan Kasten acknowledged Saturday there is a "very real possibility" the team will not reach an agreement with No. 1 overall draft pick Stephen Strasburg despite offering him a record-breaking contract.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Gold medalist wrestler Angle charged with HGH possession
item.description: Police say pro wrestler and Olympic gold medalist Kurt Angle has been arrested for possessing a human growth hormone in suburban Pittsburgh.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: New Orleans Saints kicker Garrett Hartley expects 4-game suspension for positive drug test
item.description: Saints kicker Garrett Hartley says he expects to serve a four-game suspension when the regular season begins because he tested positive for a stimulant.

item.dc:creator: ESPN.com news services
item.title: Michael Vick of Philadelphia Eagles returns to practice field, runs scout team offense.
item.description: Michael Vick was back on an NFL practice field for the first time since completing his prison sentence.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Kyle Orton still Denver Broncos' QB despite struggles in start
item.description: Kyle Orton only needs to worry about correcting his mistakes, not looking over his shoulder.

item.dc:creator: Loretta Hunt
item.title: Cristiane Santos crushes Gina Carano in Round 1
item.description: Cristiane "Cyborg" Santos lived up to her nickname by employing a seek-and-destroy style to cut down Gina Carano in one round on Saturday.
